body_html: I think we are on the same page. You either have to defeat the GIL and get to C++ code and have it do the threading or move to multiprocess. multiprocess is likely the best thing honestly and will likely prep for multinode nicely as well.
body_text: I think we are on the same page.  You either have to defeat the GIL and get to C++ code and have it do the threading or move to multiprocess.  multiprocess is likely the best thing honestly and will likely prep for multinode nicely as well.
body: I think we are on the same page.  You either have to defeat the GIL and get to C++ code and have it do the threading or move to multiprocess.  multiprocess is likely the best thing honestly and will likely prep for multinode nicely as well.
